name: CarePlan.activity.reference
title: CarePlan.activity.reference
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Activity details defined in specific resource
element.definition: The details of the proposed activity represented in a specific resource.
element.comment: Standard extension exists ([resource-pertainsToGoal](extension-resource-pertainstogoal.html)) that allows goals to be referenced from any of the referenced resources in CarePlan.activity.reference.  The goal should be visible when the resource referenced by CarePlan.activity.reference is viewed independently from the CarePlan.  Requests that are pointed to by a CarePlan using this element should *not* point to this CarePlan using the "basedOn" element.  i.e. Requests that are part of a CarePlan are not "based on" the CarePlan.
element.requirements: Details in a form consistent with other applications and contexts of use.

mapping.map: {Request that resulted in Event in activity.actionResulting}
